welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santo Domingo de los Colorados
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a vibrant city known for its colorful streets, lively markets, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Los Agachaditos
restaurants.description: Los Agachaditos is a southern food restaurant located in Santo Domingo de los Colorados.

restaurants.name: Che Luis
restaurants.description: Che Luis is a bbq joint located in Santo Domingo de los sachilas.
restaurants.address: Rio yamboya (Caracas), Santo Domingo de los sachilas

restaurants.name: La Cocina De Consuelo
restaurants.description: La Cocina De Consuelo is a restaurant located in Santo Domingo de los Colorados.
restaurants.address: Calle Río Chimbo y Avenida Quito, Santo Domingo de los Colorados

restaurants.name: El Hornero
restaurants.description: El Hornero is a pizzeria located in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas.
restaurants.address: Calle Quito (Calle Madrid), Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas

restaurants.name: Marisquería Popeye Marino
restaurants.description: Marisquería Popeye Marino is a seafood restaurant located in Santo Domingo de los Colorados.
